overview: Screenwriter Maruyama lives in the house of his uncle Takada  She writes a scenario using her uncle's women as a model.  To visit my uncle without even trying  Maruyama made love in imagination with young and sexy women!  One day, my uncle's lover Satsuki told Maruyama  Maruyama's imagination becomes reality as he sends a provocative hand of temptation.
title: Little Mother 2: Uncle Girls
